description: Phase that initiates a miscellaneous dispense activity by allowing the operator to specify a material container, required quantity, unit of measure, and related details such as dispense comments and account association.
intent: To enable the operator to set up a miscellaneous dispense action not tied to a specific order or batch by capturing all necessary dispense parameters prior to execution.
postconditions: Batch-level dispense variables (e.g., DISP_BATCH_ID, DISPENSE_MATL, CONTAINER_ID, LOT_ID, etc.) are initialized
MiscDispenseSetup phase is marked closed when the miscellaneous dispense worksheet instance is closed
The selected dispense method is recorded for reporting and outbound interface transactions
side_effects: Records the specific dispense method in MM_BOM_MATL_ST and MM_DISPENSE_ST (and their _LG/_LX) tables for later reporting
example_usage: Operator opens the Miscellaneous Dispense Setup phase, scans or enters the container and material IDs, inputs the required quantity and UOM, optionally enters a dispense comment and selects an account, then clicks Finish to commit the setup.
